page.title: 03 HOME LIFE
page.content:
JOBS AROUND THE HOUSE We asked 50 men, 50 women, 50 girls and 50 boys who did what jobs around the house. Here are the results: MAN WOMAN BOY GIRL Washing 5 50 0 5 Ironing 5 48 0 7 Decorating 46 40 4 2 Washing Up 42 48 28 37 Gardening 46 40 20 21 Baby Sitting 10 38 15 28 Car Washing 42 21 12 10 Cooking 29 49 4 17 House Cleaning 15 48 15 21 Shopping 27 50 26 21 General Repairs 41 6 0 0
We think that this shows: 1. That women do most of the jobs inside the house 2. Men do the heavier jobs arond the house.
